_comment: Display Configuration Template - Copy to data/display_config.json
_enabled_comment: Set to false to disable the display feature entirely
_layout_comment: Display layout. Supported: '16x2' (16 cols x 2 rows), '20x4' (20 cols x 4 rows)
_i2c_address_comment: I2C address of the LCD backpack. Common values: 0x27 or 0x3F
_rotationInterval_comment: Time in milliseconds between rotating to the next device display
_scrollSpeed_comment: Scroll speed in ms per character shift for long device names. Default: 400ms
_sda_comment: GPIO pin for I2C SDA. Default for ESP32: 21
_scl_comment: GPIO pin for I2C SCL. Default for ESP32: 22
